title: 我的服务器经常崩溃，求解答
author: 栗籽i
txt_content:
一天要崩好几次，以下是错误信息：
[17:09:42] [Server thread/ERROR]: Encountered an unexpected exception
java.lang.AbstractMethodError
        at net.minecraft.inventory.Container.transferTo(Container.java:52) ~[ye.class:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.event.CraftEventFactory.handleInventoryCloseEvent(CraftEventFactory.java:768) ~[CraftEventFactory.class:git-MCPC-Plus-1.7.2-R0.4-forge1033-51]

        at net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayerMP.func_71007_a(EntityPlayerMP.java:913) ~[mm.class:?]

        at net.minecraft.server.management.ItemInWorldManager.func_73078_a(ItemInWorldManager.java:466) ~[mn.class:?]

        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkSystem.func_151269_c(NetworkSystem.java:181) ~[ms.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:967) ~[MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:419) ~[lj.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:797) ~[MinecraftServer.class:?]

[17:09:42] [Server thread/ERROR]: This crash report has been saved to: D:\雨林都市四周目服务器\7\.\crash-reports\crash-2015-07-30_17.09.42-server.txt

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 更多箱子导致的，好像是和背包物品互动的时候会报错
把服务器目录下的crash-reports\crash-2015-07-30_17.09.42-server.txt里面的报错记录发上来看看

lichi2050 发表于 2015-7-30 22:05
更多箱子导致的，好像是和背包物品互动的时候会报错
谢谢，但是我删了mod之后服务器开到一半就卡住了，之后就没有反应了，玩家也进不去，是什么情况？
